# Read in SST and Chloro from Aqua Modis Sat
```{r}
require("rerddap")
## base URL does not need to given because it is the default one
#three_day_sst <- info('erdMWsstd1day_LonPM180')
#three_day_sst

raw_sst <- griddap('erdMWsstd1day_LonPM180',
 time = c('last','last'),
 latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
 longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
 fmt = "csv")



#three_day_chloro <- info('erdMWchla1day_LonPM180')
#three_day_chloro

raw_chloro <- griddap('erdMWchla1day_LonPM180',
 time = c('last','last'),
 latitude = c(31.75, 35.0),
 longitude = c(-121.5, -116.5),
 fmt = "csv")
```

# Read in Shape Files
```{r}


cha <- read_sf(here("/Users","JaketheBoss", "Documents", "Bren", "SST Code", "SST", "SST", "data", "shape", "channel_islands.shp")) %>% 
  mutate(geometry = st_transform(geometry, "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84")) %>% 
  filter(!NAME %in% c("Santa Catalina", "San Clemente"))

ca <- ne_countries(country = "united states of america", scale = "large", returnclass = "sf")

mpa <- read_sf(here("/Users","JaketheBoss", "Documents", "Bren", 
                    "SST Code", "SST", "SST", "ds582", "ds582.shp")) %>%   
  mutate(geometry = st_transform(geometry, "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84")) %>% 
  filter(Study_Regi == "SCSR")

smr <- read_sf(here("/Users","JaketheBoss", "Documents", "Bren", 
                    "SST Code", "SST", "SST", "ds582", "ds582.shp")) %>%   
  mutate(geometry = st_transform(geometry, "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84")) %>% 
  filter(Study_Regi == "SCSR") %>% 
  filter(Type %in% c("SMR", "FMR"))

smca <- read_sf(here("/Users","JaketheBoss", "Documents", "Bren", 
                    "SST Code", "SST", "SST", "ds582", "ds582.shp")) %>%   
  mutate(geometry = st_transform(geometry, "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84")) %>% 
  filter(Study_Regi == "SCSR") %>% 
  filter(Type == "SMCA")

no_take <- read_sf(here("/Users","JaketheBoss", "Documents", "Bren", 
                    "SST Code", "SST", "SST", "ds582", "ds582.shp")) %>%   
  mutate(geometry = st_transform(geometry, "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84")) %>% 
  filter(Study_Regi == "SCSR") %>% 
  filter(Type == "SMCA (No-Take)")










```

# Clean SST Data
```{r}

sst <- raw_sst[-c(2)] 
  
clean_sst <- sst[-c(1),] 

mut_sst <- clean_sst %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(longitude = as.numeric(clean_sst$longitude))) %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(latitude = as.numeric(clean_sst$latitude))) %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(sst = as.numeric(clean_sst$sst))) %>% 
  filter(sst > 0)

final_sst <- mut_sst %>% 
  mutate(sst = (sst * (9/5) + 32 )) %>% 
  mutate(sst = (sst - 3))
  


```

# Clean Chloro Data
```{r}

chloro <- raw_chloro[-c(2)] 
  
clean_chloro <- chloro[-c(1),] 

final_chloro <- clean_chloro %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(longitude = as.numeric(clean_chloro$longitude))) %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(latitude = as.numeric(clean_chloro$latitude))) %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(chlorophyll = as.numeric(clean_chloro$chlorophyll))) %>% 
  filter(chlorophyll < 15 )



```

# Create Rasters and Build `leaflet` map
```{r}
# sst Raster
r_sst <- final_sst[-c(1)]

r_sst <- as.data.frame(r_sst)

r_sst <- r_sst[c('longitude', 'latitude', 'sst')]


ras_sst <- rasterFromXYZ(r_sst, crs = 4269)

num_sst <- as.numeric(r_sst$sst)

# Chloro Raster
r_chl <- final_chloro[-c(1)]

r_chl <- as.data.frame(r_chl)

r_chl <- r_chl[c('longitude', 'latitude', 'chlorophyll')]

ras_chl <- rasterFromXYZ(r_chl, crs = 4269 )

# Pals
sst_pal <- colorNumeric(palette =colorspace::sequential_hcl(11,
  h = c(-100, 100), c = c(60, 100), l = c(15, 95), power = c(2, 0.9)), domain = r_sst$sst)

chl_pal <- colorNumeric(palette =colorspace::sequential_hcl(11,
  h = c(300, 75), c = c(35, 95), l = c(15, 90), power = c(0.8, 1.2)), domain = r_chl$chlorophyll)

#Buoy Icon

Buoy <-makeIcon('icons8-buoy-50.png', iconWidth = 30, iconHeight = 30)



app <- leaflet() %>%
  addPolygons(data = cha, color = 'black', opacity = 1, weight = 2, fill = F) %>% 
  addPolygons(data = ca, color = 'black', opacity = 1, weight = 2, fill = F) %>% 
  addPolygons(data = smr, group = "MPA Status", color = "red") %>%
  addPolygons(data = smca, group = "MPA Status", color = "blue") %>% 
  addPolygons(data = no_take, group = "MPA Status", color = "purple") %>% 
  addProviderTiles("Esri.OceanBasemap") %>%
  addRasterImage(x = ras_sst, colors = sst_pal, opacity = 0.7, 
                 group = "Sea Surface Temp") %>%
```
